title: ZAWNAWLNA
lyrics:
Chak lo leh rethei tak hi 371
Chanchin lawmawm angel-ho thu ngai ru 102
Chatuan hla mawi chu ngai ru 244
Chatuan Jeho, lo kal la 32
Chatuan lungpui aw Krista 370
Chatuan nunna rohlu ka chhar ta 411
Chatuan Pathian finnaah chuan 582
Chaute u Isua en ru 322
Chawlhna ram i panin ka rum 387
Chawlhni Lalpa kunin ngai la 560
Chhandamtu aw mawi tak chu kan hria ang 243
Chhandamtu chatuan nun nan 270
Chhandamtu chu ka sual tlanin 222
Chhandamtu hmangaihna ka hria 147
Chhandamtu hmangaihna leh chhanhimnain 488
Chhandamtu hmangaihna mak leh 139
Chhandamtu i ropui zarah 421
Chhandamtu Isua leian a lo chhuk 186
Chhandamtu ka rilru no hi 543
Chhandamtu lungngaihna Kalvari lam chu panin 218
Chhandamtu ngilnei chuan 181
Chhandamtu nung rawng ka bawl kan zingah a awm a 292
Chhandamtu tak a hnai ta e 75
Chhandamtu thisen hlu a chhuak 206
Chhandamtun kawng tluanin min hruai 158
Chhandamtun min hruai zel a 157
Chhang chu tuipui kama i phel ang khan 444
Chhum zinna piah lamah chuanin 478
Chu beram ven zan laiah chuan 103
Chumi zan reh takah chuan 119
Chung khuanu leng ruat sain 580
Chungnung berin a thiltih mak 31
